title: All 32 - Pittsburgh Steelers: Ben Roethlisberger nearing the end with Jim Wexell (Football 6/10)
description:
The Steelers are always one of the most fascinating and high-interest teams in the league. So, for this episode of our 'All 32' series, we had to bring in our resident Steelers fan Ryan Wilson, who is joined by Jim Wexell of Steel City Insider to discuss the team's outlook in 2020. The guys analyze Ben Roethlisberger's longevity at the QB position (1:45) and the team failing to address his backup this offseason. Ryan and Jim also break down the Steelers wide receiving corps (7:45), expectations for James Conner (12:15) and Minkah Fitzpatrick's value (16:15).
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @ryanwilsonCBS, @jimwexell

itunes:subtitle: Do the Steelers have a competent post Ben Roethlisberger plan at quarterback? Jim Wexell from Steel City Insider breaks down Pittsburgh's outlook.
